iti73:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti73:2.1: “Mendicants, formless states are more peaceful than states of form; cessation is more peaceful than formless states.”
iti73:2.2: That is what the Buddha said.
iti73:3.1: “There are beings in the realm of luminous form,
iti73:3.2: and others established in the formless.
iti73:4.1: But those who completely understand sensual pleasures,
iti73:4.3: those who are released in cessation,
iti73:5.1: Having directly experienced the deathless element,
iti73:6.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
